summary: Adds new spells that let you create your own automatons!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds new spells that allow you to create three different automatons:

1. Dwarven Spider
2. Dwarven Sphere
3. Dwarven Centurion

The Thrall version of each automaton is also available from Phinis Gestor once you have completed the Conjuration Ritual Spell quest.

All spells are affected by perks such as Elemental Potency (50% more powerful) and Twin Souls (Allows you to summon two).

These spells are not found anywhere in the world and can only be purchased from a vendor who has that level of conjuration. For example Farengar Secret-Fire sells level 25 Conjuration spells (Summon Flame Atronach) and will stock the Summon Dwarven Spider. Phinis Gestor will stock all of the spells however as he is a master in Conjuration.

==1.103==
* Fixed Dwarven Sphere Thrall not using ranged attack

==1.102==
* Made Dwarven Sphere use ranged attack.

==1.101==
* Fixed Twin Souls accidentally creating two machines when only one spell was cast.

==1.1==
* Added potent automatons that require the player to have "Elemental Potency".
* Added thrall automatons. These are also effected by elemental potency. Spell Tomes can be purchased from Phinis Gestor of the Winterhold College once the ritual spell quest for Conjuration is completed.

==1.0==
* Added to Workshop and Nexus
author: Icterine
